pullRequest.title: Try to fix linux pdf opening again
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #5942  and fixes probably #5882



 Change in CHANGELOG.md described (if applicable)
 Tests created for changes (if applicable)
 Manually tested changed features in running JabRef (always required)
 Screenshots added in PR description (for bigger UI changes)
 Checked documentation: Is the information available and up to date? If not: Issue created at https://github.com/JabRef/user-documentation/issues.

commit.message: Try to fix linux pdf opening again

Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into linuxOutputstream

* upstream/master:
  fix missing gson
execute stream gobbler in own task

nodes.bodyText: I guess the whole process starting has to be done in a different thread...

commit.message: add to other open method as well

nodes.bodyText: Does this need to be closed? Do we need try-with-resources here? If not, please add a comment why the buffered reader is not closed.
Please add a new line at the end of the file

commit.message:
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into linuxOutputstream

* upstream/master:
  followup fix
  Fixfetcher (#5948)
  Bump byte-buddy-parent from 1.10.7 to 1.10.8 (#5952)
  Added MenuButtons to IntegrityCheckDialog (#5955)
  Reimplement custom entry types dialog (#5799)
  Bump unirest-java from 3.4.03 to 3.5.00 (#5953)
  MySQL: Allow public key retrieval (#5909)
  Restructure and improve docs for setting up IntelliJ (#5960)
  Change syntax for Oracle multi-row insert SQL statement (#5837)
  Bump classgraph from 4.8.62 to 4.8.64 (#5954)
  Squashed 'src/main/resources/csl-styles/' changes from c5315283dd..9e818577ab
  Fix not escaping special characters in search pattern (#5938)
use process builder and close reader
